titles.title: Ryoushin no Shakkin wo Katagawari shite Morau Jouken wa Nihonichi Kawaii Joshikousei to Issho ni Kurasu Koto deshita.
両親の借金を肩代わりしてもらう条件は日本一可愛い女子高生と一緒に暮らすことでした。
I'm Gonna Live with You Not Because My Parents Left Me Their Debt But Because I Like You

title: Ryoushin no Shakkin wo Katagawari shite Morau Jouken wa Nihonichi Kawaii Joshikousei to Issho ni Kurasu Koto deshita.
title_english: I'm Gonna Live with You Not Because My Parents Left Me Their Debt But Because I Like You
title_japanese: 両親の借金を肩代わりしてもらう条件は日本一可愛い女子高生と一緒に暮らすことでした。
synopsis:
The main character, Yuuya Yoshizumi, was being pressured into paying off the debt left by his parents who had fled abroad. It was his classmate, Kaede Hitotsuba, chosen as the cutest schoolgirl in Japan, who saved him from this crisis of life and death. However, there was a catch. The condition required to fulfill in return for taking over his debt was—"In return for the loan, you have to live with me."

"Why did that happen?!" 

Yuuya's daily life collapsed on this day.

"Yuuya-kun. Let's take a bath together. Yuuya-kun, please be my hug pillow."

"That's enough, Hitotsuba-san!"

The slapstick love comedy between the beautiful, but easy-going Kaede Hitotsuba and the serious and hard-headed Yuuya Yoshizumi, starts now!

(Source: Kakuyomu, translated)
background: Ryoushin no Shakkin wo Katagawari shite Morau Jouken wa Nihonichi Kawaii Joshikousei to Issho ni Kurasu Koto deshita. began as a web novel on Kakuyomu on May 16, 2020. The first official volume was published on December 19, 2020 by Kadokawa under the Fujimi Fantasia Bunko label.

entry.name: Ryoushin no Shakkin wo Katagawari shite Morau Jouken wa Nihonichi Kawaii Joshikousei to Issho ni Kurasu Koto deshita.
